img_matching_examples_ig2_noexamples: You are to act as a radiologist and write the finding section of a chest x-ray radiology report for a patient presenting with a list of findings. Please write the findings section of a chest x-ray radiology report for a patient with the following findings: {findings} Write in the style of a radiologist, write one fluent text without enumeration, be concise and don't provide explanations or reasons. Make sure the mentioned findings occur in the report.
img_neg_matching_examples_ig2_noexamples: You are to act as a radiologist and write a chest x-ray radiology report for a patient presenting without findings. Here are a few examples of how such reports could look like. Please write the findings section of a chest x-ray radiology report for a patient whose results show no abnormalities. Write in the style of a radiologist, write one fluent text without enumeration, be concise and don't provide explanations or reasons.
img_matching_examples_ig2_noexamples_IMG: Image information: . Predicted Findings: {findings}. You are to act as a radiologist and write the finding section of a chest x-ray radiology report for this X-ray image and the given predicted findings. Write in the style of a radiologist, write one fluent text without enumeration, be concise and don't provide explanations or reasons.
img_neg_matching_examples_ig2_noexamples: Image information: . Predicted Findings: {findings}. You are to act as a radiologist and write the finding section of a chest x-ray radiology report for this X-ray image and the given predicted findings. Write in the style of a radiologist, write one fluent text without enumeration, be concise and don't provide explanations or reasons.
